label: guarantee
comment: The undertaking, expressed as text, given in cash, bond or as a written guarantee to ensure that an obligation will be fulfilled for this cross-border regulatory procedure.
The undertaking, expressed as text, given in cash, bond or as a written guarantee to ensure that an obligation will be fulfilled for this trade related tax, levy or duty.

domainIncludes.comment: A set of formal steps to satisfy a regulation, law or convention.
A trade related fiscal levy or duty.
